comment.author: 57140310@N04
comment._content:
Having served there in 1968-71 it is the beginnings of Norton AFB then known as San Bernardino AAfld, the planes change but not the terrain. The photo is looking South-east with runway 24/6 being lay out with the Santa Ana River bed in the background. The O-birds are from the 10th or 31st Observation Squadron which are listed as being station there at the note date on the photo. 

Best regards

Tom

comment.author: 49487266@N07
